text:
Hi guys! I'm Laura Vitale. And today, I want
to share with you a really quick, last minute

treat that you can make for Halloween. If
you have people coming around unexpectedly,

and you didn't have a chance to make a batch
of cookies or brownies, or what not, then
that's when Nutella s'mores come to the rescue!

Now, I know a lot of people are going to say
"This is not a real recipe. Show us a real
recipe."

Look. Sometimes I'm in a pickle where I, myself,
don't have anything on hand to share with

whoever comes over. So, things like this just
come in handy. All you need is one, and you
know - that sweet tooth craving is gone.

And they're perfect for Halloween and it's
time for indulging.

So, all you need is some graham crackers,
which I have already split in half because
they come like that.

You'll need some marshmallows and you'll need
some Nutella. Now, what you want to do it

get your broiler preheated to high. I put
mine on high. And then I put my oven rack

not on the very top, but one step lower than
the top so they don't burn really easily.

And what I'm going to do is take one marshmallow.
You can take two, but I feel like when you

squish then down, they'll just end up making
a mess. And I'm going to pop these under the
broiler in just a second.

I have these prepped, but I want to go ahead
and spread some Nutella on my other graham

crackers because if I don't keep my eye on
the marshmallows once they go into the broiler,
they will burn fast.

So, what I do is I take some Nutella - oh
how glorious is this?!
Look at that.

And then I just spread that on one of my graham
crackers. It really doesn't have to be completely

perfect. Because, once you sandwich it together
with the marshmallow, it kind of spreads out
on it's own.
So, go ahead and do that. Get them all ready.

Okay. And now what I'm going to do - I'm going
to lick that as soon as the camera is off.
Don't you worry.

I'm going to pop these under the broiler and
I'm just going to stand right there because

this is going to take about fifteen seconds
or so until they're really golden brown and

puffed up, and I'll show you what they look
like when they're there.
They only took seconds.
And then I just take the Nutella cracker.
Ugh!
I know.
I know!
I'm crazy.

You could put a layer of Nutella underneath
the marshmallow, but then you're really, really

going crazy here. I mean, I'm all for it.
I'm all for you having fun. I'm all for you
breaking the rules.

I don't know what to do with myself. I don't
know which to go with first. I really feeling
- This is a really tough choice. Oay?
I'm going to go with this one.
Oh yes.

The bottom graham cracker, the one you had
your marshmallow sitting on is really warm,
and the Nutella.
I know.
I'm crazy.
Mmm hmm!

Why use any other chocolate when you can use
Nutella? It's beyond me. I'm going to go ahead

and have a party all by myself. I hope that
you make this and I hope that you love this,

and send me a picture on Instagram, Facebook
or Twitter.

Go on LauraintheKitchen.com - well not that
you will need a recipe for this - but if you

are looking for a great, really kick "uh huh"
recipe for this time of year - I got you covered.

LauraintheKitchen.com has got you covered.
I hope you enjoyed spending time with me.
I'll see you next time.
Bye bye!
